name: Mustard Pork Chops with Crispy Cabbage
ingredients: 1 medium head cabbage, about 27 ounces before trimming
6 thin bone-in pork chops, about 1 1/2 pounds *

instructions.en: Cut cabbage into 1-inch wedges. Brush with melted butter and season. Roast at 450°F (230°C) for 20-25 minutes until browned.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte kapustu na 2,5 cm kliny. Potrite roztopeným maslom a ochuťte. Pečte pri 230°C 20-25 minút do zhnednutia.
instructions.ja: キャベツを2.5cm幅のくさび形に切ります。溶かしバターを塗り、調味します。230°Cのオーブンで20-25分、茶色くなるまで焼きます。

instructions.en: Season pork chops. Brown in batches in a skillet with oil and butter, 2 minutes per side. Keep warm.
instructions.sk: Ochuťte bravčové kotlety. Opečte po dávkach na panvici s olejom a maslom, 2 minúty z každej strany. Udržujte teplé.
instructions.ja: 豚肉に味付けをします。フライパンで油とバターを使い、バッチに分けて両面2分ずつ焼きます。温めておきます。

instructions.en: Make sauce: Boil broth, cream, and mustard in skillet, scraping up browned bits. Simmer until thickened.
instructions.sk: Pripravte omáčku: Povarte vývar, smotanu a horčicu v panvici, zoškrabujúc pripečené kúsky. Varte do zhustnutia.
instructions.ja: ソースを作ります：フライパンでブロス、クリーム、マスタードを煮立て、こびりついた部分をこそげ落とします。とろみがつくまで煮詰めます。

instructions.en: Add pork chops to sauce, simmer until sauce reaches desired thickness. Serve with roasted cabbage.
instructions.sk: Pridajte bravčové kotlety do omáčky, varte kým omáčka nedosiahne požadovanú hustotu. Podávajte s pečenou kapustou.
instructions.ja: 豚肉をソースに戻し入れ、好みの濃さになるまで煮込みます。ローストしたキャベツと一緒に提供します。

notes: Makes 6 servings. Do not freeze. *Boneless loin chops can be used. Suggest using low sodium broth to avoid overly salty sauce. The mustard sauce doesn't reheat well.
